mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM course_scrap WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND course_id = #{courseId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_scrap (user_id, course_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{courseId}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM course_scrap WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND course_id = #{courseId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.course_id, c.title, c.thumbnail, c.difficulty, c.distance, c.expected_time, c.scrap_count, u.nickname AS writerNickname, 0.0 AS currentDistance FROM course_scrap s JOIN course c ON s.course_id = c.course_id JOIN users u ON c.writer_id = u.user_id WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY s.created_at DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
